thread.title: Thursday’s Prepxtra football picks - PrepXtra
thread.title_full: Thursday’s Prepxtra football picks - PrepXtra Story

author: knoxnews.com
title: Thursday’s Prepxtra football picks - PrepXtra
text:
Central (6-1, 3-0 Region 2-4A) at Anderson County (3-4, 1-2), 7 p.m., MyVLT: Regardless of what happens on Thursday, Anderson County’s playoff hopes will hinge on its season finale against Carter on Oct. 30. That should take some of the pressure off this game as the Mavericks vie for a marquee win in a rebuilding year. Anderson County is coming off a bye, and scored more than 50 points in two of its past three games. The outlier was Catholic, which Central overwhelmed with its defensive speed in Week 3. Expect the Bobcats to do the same on Thursday.
PrepXtra Pick: Central 31, Anderson County 21
Also: Tennessee School for the Deaf over North Carolina School for the Deaf
Last Week: 28-4 (87.5 percent); Overall: 211-62 (77.3)
Nick Carboni’s Picks
Central over Anderson County; TSD over NCSD
Last Week: 26-6 (81.3); Overall: 203-70 (74.4)
